thread.title: Steven Bochco, Creator of ‘Hill Street Blues’ and Other Shows, Dies at 74

author: wsjcom
title: Steven Bochco, Creator of ‘Hill Street Blues’ and Other Shows, Dies at 74
text:
LOS ANGELES—Steven Bochco, a writer and producer known for creating landmark 1980s and 1990s television shows like “Hill Street Blues,” “L.A. Law” and “NYPD Blue,” has died. He was 74.
A family spokesman says Mr. Bochco died Sunday in his sleep after a battle with cancer.
Premiering in January 1981, “Hill Street Blues” challenged, even confounded,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
